document_data.Summary: Heroes of the Living Jungle participated in the annual [[Dohi-ri]] celebration â€“ the [[Festival of the Mask]], Zurich which they embarked on a journey to assemble and decorate masks from the boon of the jungle. The heroes traveled to marked destinations to collect jungle dyes and other ornamentations. They confronted a tribe of slaver [[tasloi]], a band of [[leopard katanga]] pretending to be fellow [[Festival Walk]]ers, visited an ancient shrine to an ancestor [[grippli]] race, parleyed with an evil [[nereid]] and a peaceful [[water naga]]. Eventually, one of the heroes was named the new Masked One, and their mask was [[enchanted]].
